actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the minimum coverage under the government life insurance policies for civil service retirees from 25 percent to 40 percent.

summary.text: Prohibits the amount of Government life insurance provided without cost to a Federal employee who retires on an immediate or disability annuity from being reduced to less than 40 percent (presently 25 percent) of the amount of insurance in effect for the employee upon retirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the minimum coverage under the government life insurance policies for civil service retirees from 25 percent to 40 percent.
